Name: Card Dealer
Features: Casino Combat;Stacking the Deck;Gambler's Intuition;Dealer's Determination;Unarmored Defense;Spell Thief;Fast Hands;Combat Quickness;Swashbuckler Style;Combat Expertise;Elusive
Options: Dealer's Proficiency;Dealer's Expertise;Dealer's Gambit;Tricked Deck;Dealer's Archetype;Arcane Cards;Dealer's Cantrips
Description: The Card Dealer is a master of deceptive combat. Through nothing more than the use of a simple deck of cards and a set of dice, they may easily disrupt the flow of combat to their favor, and destroy their enemies.
